ul_537163: find . -type f -path "./*.a/processed/*" -exec sh -c '
for path; do
  prefix=${path%%.a/processed*}
  cp "$path" "test/${prefix##*/}_${path##*processed/}"
done
' sh {} +

Top-3 Scripts:
so_16306877: counter=1
cd /my/image/directory
for f in $(ls -1)
do
  new_filename=$(printf "%04d" ${counter})     
  echo "renaming ${f} ..to.. ${new_filename}"
  mv ${f} ${new_filename}
  (( counter=${counter}+1 ))
done
